name: anandis
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), w3)
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)), w3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), w3)
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)), w3)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)), w3)
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)), w3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), w3)
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)), w3)

comment: Inference that undistributes conjunction in the antecedent. (Contributed by NM, 7-Jun-2004.)
